segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am looking for a pair of gloves .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about this one ? It's the latest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , but I want a pair of mittens .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , it's out of stock right now .
segments.speaker: S1
